page.title: 20General Info. Continued.
page.content: Politics. Local and general Elections do not generally cause a great stir 'Safe' Conservative area and very few candidates even bother to canvas at all. The elections take place in the local village halls. Trade. No village shops. Two milkmen deliver every day - also the baker and newspaper delivered. A mobile shop calls three times a week and coal and oil are delivered, so it is possible to manage without leaving village to shop. Transport. Roads are very Rural but generally well maintained. Many people have cars and/or bikes. Buses run to Sudbury on a Thursday only - Thursday being market day in Sudbury. One private airoplane in area - owned by Farmer. Communications. Many private telepho- nes + telephone box in villages+Post
